name: Big Beard
descriptions: Big Beard is a gun-for-hire residing in the Atomic Wrangler Casino in Freeside in Fallout: New Vegas.
At some point prior to 2281, Big Beard and Little Beard came into owing a debt to Carlitos Wayne, though it's only known that it involved their beards.
As partnered guns-for-hire, Big Beard typically acts as the one to talk to, based off who has the bigger whiskers.

topics.response_text: Let me guess. You want to know my secret - how I got my beard to grow in so thick.

topics.topic_text: Does the name "Carlitos" ring a bell?
What sort of debt do you owe Carlitos?
topics.response_text: Let's just say it had something to do with the beards, and leave it at that.

topics.topic_text: Carlitos is ready to cash in his chips.
topics.response_text: I see. Well, he can count on Little Beard and me for an assist. Tell us where and when, and we'll be there.

topics.topic_text: Carlitos says he's ready to cash in his chips.
topics.response_text: I see. Well, he can count on Little Beard and me for an assist. Tell us where and when, and we'll be there.

topics.topic_text: The "where" is Freeside, and "now" would be a good time.
topics.response_text: {intently - going into battle}The Beards will be there.
Sorry, but I can't tell you that. Trade secret.
